titleStmt.title: The schysmatical puritan A sermon preached at Witney concerning the lawfulnesse of church-authority, for ordaining, and commanding of rites, and ceremonies, to beautifie the Church. By Giles Widdowes rector of St Martins church in Oxford.

notesStmt.note: Most copies have an "i" hand-stamped over the "y" in "schysmatical" on the title page; a few copies apparently are altered in MS. (STC).
